column2:
"Everyone, thank you for the encore!Everyone's intense emotions... I'm really feeling it!
I'll do one more song, then. Let's go!"
"It's cheery, intense, and full of brilliance! Come on everybody, get pumped up!"
"Thank you so much for that amazing experience!"
"My body and my heart, they're overflowing with satisfaction! I really do love singing for you all!"
"Remember, you are never alone! If you ever forget that, just think of this song! This song is for everyone!"
"See you all later!"

"Suddenly you ask \"Why?\"
What's the reason I'm here...?"
"Everyone has these moments!"
"The pain in your chest is not something you can heal with a fake smile!"
"You can't lie about your true emotions!"

"The road you traveled was covered in darkness.
You cut off yesterday's pain and looked bravely into the dark future!"

"You are shouting and never alone!
Your cries will get through, not matter how far the darkness extends!"

"You are fighting and forever lasting!
Now is the time to become a vivid light and fight the darkness!"

"The reason you live your life...
The answer to that is love!"
"Even when you're alone at night, consumed by the darkness..."

"Even though you make a fist to protect...
Once it opens, those same hands will embrace someone."
"Don't forget those warm connections you have..."
"The tears on your cheeks are evidence of how sincere you are..."

"We are sharing and never alone!
Even if you don't say anything, heaven can hear your wish!"

"We are shining and forever lasting!
Focus your eyes on the path ahead!"
"Just chase after the true light of faith and hold it in your hand!"

"You are shouting and never alone!
Your voice calling out reaches my heart!"

"You are fighting and forever lasting!
Burning brightly with the spirit of a warrior!"
"Now it's time to become vivid! To shine and fight!"
"Our Fighting ver. MIYABI"
"Quna"
